text: Gerald Posner "Jerry" Carmen (July 8, 1930 â€“ September 1, 2023) was an American businessman and politician. He was born in Quincy, Massachusetts. He was a member of the Republican Party. From 1981 to 1984, he was the Administrator of the General Services Administration during the Ronald Reagan presidency. Carmen died on September 1, 2023, at the age of 93.Gerald P.
